subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ty Conklin had his sixth shutout and Pavel Datsyuk had two goals and two assists to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 6-0 win over the visiting San Jose Sharks on Thursday night.
snippet: Ty Conklin had his sixth shutout and Pavel Datsyuk had two goals and two assists to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 6-0 win over the visiting San Jose Sharks on Thursday night.
